tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CampaignMetrics (
    metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id UUID REFERENCES SocialMediaCampaigns(campaign_id),
    date DATE,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE click_through_rates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    click_count INT,
    click_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES advertising_campaigns(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE conversion_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    conversion_count INT,
    conversion_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES advertising_campaigns(campaign_id)
);
